member.name: M:TencentCloud.Dcdb.V20180411.DcdbClient.ModifyAccountPrivileges(TencentCloud.Dcdb.V20180411.Models.ModifyAccountPrivilegesRequest)
member.summary:
This API is used to modify the permissions of a TencentDB instance account.
**Notes** - Only the SELECT permission (that is, set the permission parameter to `["SELECT"]`) of the system database `mysql` can be granted. - An error will be reported if read-write permissions are granted to a read-only account. - If the parameter is not passed in, no change will be made to the granted table permissions. To clear the granted table permissions, set `Privileges` to an empty array.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Dcdb.V20180411.DcdbClient.ModifyAccountPrivilegesSync(TencentCloud.Dcdb.V20180411.Models.ModifyAccountPrivilegesRequest)
member.summary:
This API is used to modify the permissions of a TencentDB instance account.
**Notes** - Only the SELECT permission (that is, set the permission parameter to `["SELECT"]`) of the system database `mysql` can be granted. - An error will be reported if read-write permissions are granted to a read-only account. - If the parameter is not passed in, no change will be made to the granted table permissions. To clear the granted table permissions, set `Privileges` to an empty array.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dcdb.V20180411.Models.CreateAccountRequest.ReadOnly
member.summary: Whether to create a read-only account. 0: no; 1: for the account's SQL requests, the secondary will be used first, and if it is unavailable, the primary will be used; 2: the secondary will be used first, and if it is unavailable, the operation will fail; 3: only the secondary will be read from.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dcdb.V20180411.Models.CreateAccountRequest.Description
member.summary: Account remarks, which can contain 0-256 letters, digits, and common symbols.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dcdb.V20180411.Models.CreateAccountRequest.DelayThresh
member.summary: If the secondary delay exceeds the set value of this parameter, the secondary will be deemed to have failed. It is recommended that this parameter be set to a value greater than 10. This parameter takes effect when `ReadOnly` is 1 or 2.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dcdb.V20180411.Models.CreateAccountRequest.SlaveConst
member.summary: Whether to specify a replica server for read-only account. Valid values: `0` (No replica server is specified, which means that the proxy will select another available replica server to keep connection with the client if the current replica server doesnt meet the requirement). `1` (The replica server is specified, which means that the connection will be disconnected if the specified replica server doesnt meet the requirement.)

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dcdb.V20180411.Models.CreateAccountRequest.MaxUserConnections
member.summary: Maximum number of connections. If left empty or `0` is passed in, the connections will be unlimited. This parameter configuration is not supported for kernel version 10.1.

member.summary: Read-only flag. 0: no; 1: for the account's SQL requests, the replica will be used first, and if it is unavailable, the source will be used; 2: the replica will be used first, and if it is unavailable, the operation will fail.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dcdb.V20180411.Models.DBAccount.DelayThresh
member.summary: If the replica delay exceeds the set value of this parameter, the replica will be considered to have failed. Set this parameter to a value above 10. This parameter takes effect when `ReadOnly` is 1 or 2.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dcdb.V20180411.Models.DBAccount.SlaveConst
member.summary: Whether to specify a replica server for read-only account. Valid values: `0` (No replica server is specified, which means that the proxy will select another available replica server to keep connection with the client if the current replica server doesnt meet the requirement). `1` (The replica server is specified, which means that the connection will be disconnected if the specified replica server doesnt meet the requirement.)

member.summary: Global permission. Valid values: `SELECT`, `INSERT`, `UPDATE`, `DELETE`, `CREATE`, `DROP`, `REFERENCES`, `INDEX`, `ALTER`, `CREATE TEMPORARY TABLES`, `LOCK TABLES`, `EXECUTE`, `CREATE VIEW`, `SHOW VIEW`, `CREATE ROUTINE`, `ALTER ROUTINE`, `EVENT`, `TRIGGER`, `SHOW DATABASES`, `REPLICATION CLIENT`, `REPLICATION SLAVE`. Valid values: `SELECT`, `INSERT`, `UPDATE`, `DELETE`, `CREATE`, `DROP`, `REFERENCES`, `INDEX`, `ALTER`, `CREATE TEMPORARY TABLES`, `LOCK TABLES`, `EXECUTE`, `CREATE VIEW`, `SHOW VIEW`, `CREATE ROUTINE`, `ALTER ROUTINE`, `EVENT`, `TRIGGER`. Table permission. Valid values: `SELECT`, `INSERT`, `UPDATE`, `DELETE`, `CREATE`, `DROP`, `REFERENCES`, `INDEX`, `ALTER`, `CREATE VIEW`, `SHOW VIEW`, `TRIGGER`. Field permission. Valid values: `INSERT`, `REFERENCES`, `SELECT`, `UPDATE`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dcdb.V20180411.Models.GrantAccountPrivilegesRequest.Type
member.summary: Type. Valid values: `table`, `\*`. If `DbName` is a specific database name and `Type` is `\*`, the permissions of the database will be set (i.e., `db.\*`), in which case the `Object` parameter will be ignored
